hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Fire Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Boomerang#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Falling Ceiling Room Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Compass Room Side Chest

GC (Maze).text: Never give up. Trust your instincts!

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: Fingers-Mazda, the first thief in the world, stole fire from the gods.^But he was unable to fence it.&It was too hot.&He got really burned on that deal.
